skill		level		efficiency*	fd gain		total fd	total fragments cost
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ruin     	26->27		0.000348	0.023		82.748		25634
ruin     	27->28		0.000400	0.023		82.791		25814
ruin     	28->29		0.000490	0.023		82.833		26002
ruin     	29->30		0.000679	0.255		83.299		26377
legacy   	28->29		0.000124	0.006		83.310		26565
legacy   	29->30		0.000171	0.064		83.427		26940

*efficiency is (morally) fd gain divided by fragment cost. Overall efficiency
should generally decrease as you move down the list. You may note a few times
where this doesn't happens, most noticeably with legacy. This is because
future fd gains (e.g. 1 fd on burst from legacy) get amoratized over the
previous levels. So you get situations where the efficiency increases as you
get closer to the breakpoint. This behavior is expected if slightly unintuitive.
